name: Prawrtect the city
description:
Install instructions

For Windows users:

  1. Extract "prawrtect-the-city-windows.zip";
  2. Enter directory "prawrtect-the-city-windows";
  3. Run "app.exe".

For Linux users (more guaranteed to work):

  1. Extract "prawrtect-the-city-linux.zip";
  2. Enter directory "prawrtect-the-city-linux";
  3. Run "prawrtect-linux" (command: ./prawrtect-linux).
